verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wait on the Lord
Wait on the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm gonna wait on You
I'm gonna wait on You
I've tasted your goodness
I'll trust in Your promise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He will renew your strength
to wait I say
wait on the Lord,
wait on the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
While I'm waiting I'll be worshipping
while I'm waiting I'll be praising
while I'm waiting I'll be praising
while I'm waiting I'll be praising.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
What's the use of complaining
when I can be praising
